name: @zed-industries/agent-client-protocol
description: The Agent Client Protocol (ACP) is a protocol that standardizes communication between *code editors* (interactive programs for viewing and editing source code) and *coding agents* (programs that use generative AI to autonomously modify code).
author: Zed Industries

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist typescript/*.js typescript/*.d.ts typescript/*.js.map tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && cargo clean
scripts.test: cargo check --all-targets && cargo test && vitest run
scripts.generate: npm run generate:json-schema && npm run generate:ts-schema && npm run format
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs:ts:verify
scripts.docs:ts:build: cd typescript && typedoc && echo 'TypeScript documentation generated in ./typescript/docs'
scripts.docs:ts:verify: cd typescript && typedoc --emit none && echo 'TypeDoc verification passed'
